response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Considering its worth to both parties, we propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. We aim to achieve a fair deal that maximizes value for us while ensuring you receive an excellent return on your investment. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 1300000}
